name: .SXM File Extension
summary: Learn about .SXM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Math formula originally created by StarMath but still supported by Apache OpenOffice Math (previously part of OpenOffice.org), the successor to StarMath; saves a mathematical formula using an older file format before Apache OpenOffice adopted the OpenDocument specification.

content: NOTE: StarMath originally used .SMF files through version 5. However, StarMath 6 and Apache OpenOffice version 1 both use the SXM format. Apache OpenOffice Math formulas now use the .ODF (OpenDocument Formula) extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
